sen.j: 射詰（いづめ）とは、弓道の個人競技において、決勝で順位を決定する方法。
sen.e: Izume means a method of deciding ranking in the final game of a non-team tournament of Japanese archery.
Izume refers a method of deciding ranking in the final of an individual tournament of Japanese archery.
sen.cmt: means→refers,final game→final,a non-team→an individual と修正しました。
sen.e: Izume refers a method of deciding ranking in the final of an individual tournament of Japanese archery.

sen.j: 一射ずつ矢を放ち、失中した者は除かれ、的中した者は次の一射を行い、最終的に残った者（的中させ続けた者）が勝ちとなる。
sen.e: The process of izume is as follows: players shoot an arrow each; those who have missed the target are eliminated; players who hit the target shoot a second arrows each and so on; and the player who stays till the end (who keeps hitting the target) becomes the winner.

The process of izume is as follows: Competitors shoot an arrow each; those who have missed the target are eliminated; competitors who hit the target shoot a second arrow each and so on; and the competitor who stays until the end (who keeps hitting the target) becomes the winner.
sen.cmt: players, player→Competitors, competitorsecond arrows→second arrow,till→until と修正しました。
sen.e: The process of izume is as follows: Competitors shoot an arrow each; those who have missed the target are eliminated; competitors who hit the target shoot a second arrow each and so on; and the competitor who stays until the end (who keeps hitting the target) becomes the winner.

sen.j: ただし、全員が的を外した場合は、再び射ることが出来る。
sen.e: However, if all players miss the target, then they will be able to shoot an arrow each again.
However, if all competitors miss the target, then they will be able to shoot again.
sen.cmt: players→competitors と修正しました。an arrow each をｓ駆除しました。（”一射”とは記述していないので）
sen.e: However, if all competitors miss the target, then they will be able to shoot again.
How to decide the outcome of a game
How to decide the outcome of a competition
How to decide the outcome of a competition

sen.j: 基本的には、連続で的中し続けたものが勝ち。
sen.e: Basically the player who continues to hit the target will win.
Basically, the competitor who continues to hit the target will win.
sen.cmt: カンマを挿入しました。player→competitor と修正しました。
sen.e: Basically, the competitor who continues to hit the target will win.

sen.j: 的を外した者はそこで競技終了となる。
sen.e: The player has lost the game when missing the target.
The competitor finishes the competition when he or she misses the target.
sen.cmt: player→competitor,原文に応じて修正しました。
sen.e: The competitor finishes the competition when he or she misses the target.

sen.j: 以下に例を示す（○は中り、×は外れを示す）。
sen.e: Some game examples are shown below (O means a hit and X means a miss).
Examples are shown as follows (O means a hit and X means a miss).
sen.cmt: Some game examples are shown below→Examples are shown as follows と修正しました。
sen.e: Examples are shown as follows (O means a hit and X means a miss).
A OOOX =>2nd place
A OOOX =>Second place
A OOOX =>Second place
B OOOO =>1st place
B OOOO =>First place
B OOOO =>First place
Ｃ OX =>3rd place
Ｃ OX =>Third place
Ｃ OX =>Third place
D X =>4th place
D X =>Fourth place
D X =>Fourth place

sen.j: 失中者の順位を決定する際には（以下例ではＡとCの順位を決定する場合）遠近競射を行う。
sen.e: The ranking of those who have missed the target (A and C in the following case) is to be decided by enkin-kyosha (遠近競射: competition shooting to decide ranking based on how close an arrow is to the center of the target)

The ranking of those who missed the target (A and C in the following case) is decided by enkin-kyosha (competition shooting to decide ranking based on how close an arrow is to the center of the target).
sen.cmt: have missed→missed,to be を削除しました。遠近競射: を削除しました。
sen.e: The ranking of those who missed the target (A and C in the following case) is decided by enkin-kyosha (competition shooting to decide ranking based on how close an arrow is to the center of the target).
A OOOX =>to be decided by enkin-kyosha
A OOOX =>to be decided by enkin-kyosha
A OOOX =>to be decided by enkin-kyosha
B OOOO =>1st place
B OOOO =>First place
B OOOO =>First place
Ｃ OOOX =>to be decided by enkin-kyosha
Ｃ OOOX =>to be decided by enkin-kyosha
Ｃ OOOX =>to be decided by enkin-kyosha
D X =>4th place
D X =>Fourth place
D X =>Fourth place

sen.j: ただし全員が失中した場合は、再度全員が一矢ずつ射る。
sen.e: If all players have missed the target, then everyone shoots again.
If all players miss the target, then everyone shoots one arrow each again.
sen.cmt: have missed→miss, ”一矢ずつ”を補いました。
sen.e: If all players miss the target, then everyone shoots one arrow each again.

sen.j: 連続的中をしなくても以下の場合はＢが勝ちである。
sen.e: None of the players has consecutively hit the target in the following example, but the winner is still B.
None of the players has consecutively hit the target in the following example, but the winner is still B.
None of the players has consecutively hit the target in the following example, but the winner is still B.
A OXOX =>2nd place
A OXOX =>Second place
A OXOX =>Second place
B OXOO =>1st place
B OXOO =>First place
B OXOO =>First place
Ｃ OXX =>3rd place
Ｃ OXX =>Third place
Ｃ OXX =>Third place
D X =>4th place
D X =>Fourth place
D X =>Fourth place

sen.j: この場合は二射目でＡ、Ｂ、Ｃの全員が外している為、Ａ、Ｂ、Ｃは再び射ることができる。
sen.e: In the above case, A, B and C are allowed to shoot once again as they have equally missed the target at the second shooting.
In the case above, A, B and C are allowed to shoot once again as they have equally missed the target at the second shooting.
sen.cmt: the above case→the case above と修正しました。
sen.e: In the case above, A, B and C are allowed to shoot once again as they have equally missed the target at the second shooting.

sen.j: Ｄは一射目で外しているので射ることができない。
sen.e: Having missed the target at the first shooting, D is not given another chance.
Since missing the target at the first shooting, D is not given another chance.
sen.cmt: Having missing→Since missing と修正しました。
sen.e: Since missing the target at the first shooting, D is not given another chance.
